name: vue-crud-x
description: NodeJS and VueJS Web Application Cookbook & a VueJS CRUD component

scripts.tar: tar --exclude="node_modules" -zcvf deploy-app.tgz . && scp -i %npm_package_config_pem% deploy-app.tgz %npm_package_config_url%:~ && rm deploy-app.tgz
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build && npm run tar && npm run untar
scripts.tar:fe: tar -zcvf deploy-www.tgz dist && scp -i %npm_package_config_pem% deploy-www.tgz %npm_package_config_url%:~ && rm deploy-www.tgz
scripts.prod:start: ssh -i ../../test.pem ubuntu@127.0.0.1 "cd ~/api; authbind --deep pm2 start --only api --env production;"
scripts.prod: npm run prod:stop&&npm run prod:deploy&&npm run prod:start
